#summary Project Properties
#labels Phase-Support
= Introduction =
You can configure the following topics here. 
  # [WorkspacePreferences#Settings General]
  # [#Advanced_Settings Advanced Settings]
  # [#Build Build]
  # [WorkspacePreferences#Problems Problems]
  # [#Suppressions Suppressions]

Some settings can be taken over from the appropriate [WorkspacePreferences workspace preferences] page. This can be accomplished by selecting the radio button "Use workspace settings". You can even directly jump to the referring workspace preference page by clicking on "Configure Workspace Settings..."

= Advanced Settings =
[http://cppcheclipse.googlecode.com/svn/images/properties-advsettings.gif]
You can enter any additional command line arguments as a string here. Please regard that these command line arguments will be transfered additionally to those, which are set in [WorkspacePreferences#Settings General].
First have a look, if any of the command line arguments you want to use, are available in [WorkspacePreferences#Settings General].
For a description of valid arguments have look at the [http://cppcheck.sourceforge.net/manual.pdf cppcheck manual].
